about_the_game:
A visual novel with 3D model animation featuring BDSM (Bondage, Domination, Sadism, and Masochism).


* Please check the compatibility by demo version before purchasing the product.
* The latest edition is Ver.1.1.4.


■Story
The protagonist has a quite masochistic propensity.
One day, he worked up the courage and confessed that he'd like to try being dominated.
But just as he was busy worrying about Her being disgusted with him for asking such a thing, the response was motivated one.
It didn't take long before they started BDSM sessions.
After they opened their hearts, domination and submissiveness has naturally been made.
The relationship gets gradually escalated...
* This game contains hard BDSM sessions. Please play BDSM always with safety in your mind.

■Heroine
Saki (Cast : Aruha Kotone)
The same age as the protagonist and has been dating for just over a year.
Taller than your average girl, and a bit more on the slender side.
Long, silky black hair is one of Her charms.
She and the protagonist moved into an apartment recently.
She had a talent of sadist from the beginning, so now She completely loves the dominant role.


■Release notes
1.1.1 First edition on Steam
1.1.2 Fixed an issue on ultra wide monitor
1.1.3 Improved PVC texture
1.1.4 Fixed a background display error

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains hard BDSM (Bondage, Domination, Sadism, and Masochism) sessions. Please play BDSM always with safety in your mind.

name: Escalation!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i7-11700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: A visual novel with 3D model animation featuring BDSM (Bondage, Domination, Sadism, and Masochism).
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
